What an unexpectedly awesome place to eat!  We walked there because of the good Yelp reviews, and it ended up being worth the walk from our place in Old City.The highlights:  our Waitress Anna was awesome.  Spoke great English and was just a ton of fun.  All of our dinner entrees were really great, and the dinner was awesome.  I recommend the duck or the veal. We also had the cookie for dessert, I highly recommend it.  It had a really neat design, and a really fun staff.  If you are in the area, you will not be disappointed.  It was about €50 for the two of us with 2 drinks and desserts.  Two thumbs up!-love,Philly friends
